Key Match Events: Vincent Aboubakar scored the opening goal from a penalty kick in the 8th minute
Martin Hongla doubled Cameroon's lead in the 39th minute
Bryan Mbuemo restored Cameroon's two-goal cushion in the dying minutes of the first half
Christian Bassogog scored the fourth goal for Cameroon in the 55th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place in the Japoma Stadium in Douala, Cameroon
The result leaves Cameroon at the top of Group J with seven points after three games, two points ahead of second-placed Zimbabwe
Others: Kenya managed to score a goal through Michael Olunga in the 41st minute
Changes were made by Kenya coach Engin Firat, but they were unable to recover
